sn49.1-12:4.3: “Mendicants, there are these four right endeavors.
sn49.1-12:4.5: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and endeavors so that bad, unwholesome qualities don’t arise.
sn49.1-12:4.6: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and endeavor so that bad, unwholesome qualities that have arisen are given up.
sn49.1-12:4.7: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and endeavor so that wholesome qualities arise.
sn49.1-12:4.8: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and endeavor so that wholesome qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
sn49.1-12:4.9: These are the four right endeavors.
sn49.1-12:5.1: The Ganges river slants, slopes, and inclines to the east.
sn49.1-12:5.2: In the same way, a mendicant who develops the four right endeavors slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
sn49.1-12:5.3: And how does a mendicant who develops the four right endeavors slant, slope, and incline to extinguishment?
sn49.1-12:5.4: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and endeavor so that bad, unwholesome qualities don’t arise.
sn49.1-12:5.5: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and endeavor so that bad, unwholesome qualities that have arisen are given up.
sn49.1-12:5.6: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and endeavor so that wholesome qualities arise.
sn49.1-12:5.7: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and endeavor so that wholesome qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
sn49.1-12:5.8: That’s how a mendicant who develops the four right endeavors slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.”
sn49.1-12:9.1: Six on slanting to the east,
sn49.1-12:9.2: and six on slanting to the ocean;
sn49.1-12:9.4: and that’s how this chapter is recited.
